headline: Dow Jones Special Committee Elects John F. Tefft
summary: NEW YORK, October 21, 2025--The Dow Jones Special Committee, established as part of the acquisition of Dow Jones & Co. by News Corp in late 2007, has elected John F. Tefft to succeed Anne W. Patterson, who has retired from the committee after seven years of service.

headline: Dow Jones Names Sarah Cottle as Executive Vice President and General Manager of Dow Jones Energy
summary: NEW YORK, October 21, 2025--Dow Jones today announced the appointment of Sarah Cottle as executive vice president and general manager of Dow Jones Energy. In this role, Cottle will be responsible for managing the company’s growing roster of leading news, data and analysis offerings for the energy, chemical and environmental commodity markets which includes OPIS, a Dow Jones company, Chemical Market Analytics, PetroChem Wire, McCloskey, A2i Systems and Eco-Movement.
